body:
[e-spres-oh] is looking for an experienced and talented QA tester in Timisoara to join the team we have assembled over the past four years. 							
We function in a results-oriented work environment, which means that you’ll be involved in all strategic discussions regarding your work. What is more, you will be able to make up your own working schedule and you will be based in one of the coolest offices in Timisoara. 
For more details regarding the job requirements, our culture and the benefits we offer, click Apply to get to our Jobs page and fill out the application form.
=> https://e-spres-oh.com/jobs/timisoara/qa-tester
title: QA Tester
